scripts.publish:linux: npm run build:css && dotnet publish . -c Release -o ../publish/linux-x64 --self-contained true --runtime linux-x64
scripts.publish:windows: npm run build:css && dotnet publish . -c Release -o ../publish/windows-x64 --self-contained true --runtime win-x64
scripts.publish:mac: npm run build:css && dotnet publish . -c Release -o ../publish/osx-x64 --self-contained true --runtime osx-x64
scripts.publish:mac-arm: npm run build:css && dotnet publish . -c Release -o ../publish/osx-arm64 --self-contained true --runtime osx-arm64
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:linux && npm run publish:windows && npm run publish:mac && npm run publish:mac-arm
scripts.publish:portable: npm run build:css && dotnet publish . -c Release -o ../publish/portable --self-contained false
